Text.val: Author : asaf Kehati
12.08.2013 GB SCR18343 Replaced the "CRDB_CATEGORY between 6 and 8" by the "CRDB_CATEGORY in (6, 7, 8, 17)"
08.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
24.08.2011 GB SCR16698 Extended the Additional selections
27.06.2011 GB SCR16559 Changed picture of attribute for v.ACTION
26.04.2011 GB SCR16395 Removed test at program start, extended condition for
selection 1/2
21.02.2011 AK SCR13992 fixed SQL bug- selection 1,2 for YY countries problem
26.04.2010 AK SCR13725 aded new empty parameter when calling BID700
23.09.2009 GB SCR14928 Deleted condition CLNT211_NOTIFICATION = true from
01.08.2008 SH SCR13804 Selection 1/2 Replaced test on DEBH_HADR_LANGUAGE
=,<> 'FR' into DEBC_LANGAUGE =,<> ( 4 times) in parts where DEBC_COUNTRY is
26.11.2007 AK SCR13163 chage the delete condition in 'delete handled advice'
and the condition in selectin 1 and 2 (see SCR)
19.10.2006 AK SCR12021 fix a bug in recovery
21.06.2006 AK SCR11478 set transaction in SELECTION 1 and SELECTION 2 to None
07.06.2006 AK SCR11435 fix bug in Delete handled advices
01.06.2006 AK SCR11261 added tasks "Delete handled advices",
"Delete empty advice headers" and "Reset ActiveUser"
19.05.2006 AK SCR11312 added category 6-8 to the sql qdelete in
"DETETE advice from today" anf "DETETE headers from today"
18.05.2006 JJ SCR11293 disabled calls "Delete ... from today" tasks
15.05.2006 AK SCR11312 ignore handeld advice when making a newone
03-02-2006 AK SCR???? changed the program DELETE temp tablr TDIV to delete only
where TDIV_CALLPROG = 'BID704'
07-12-2005 AK SCR9717 The following test should be excluded from both selections
NOT (DEBC_DUNNINGSTOP = true and DEBC_FINANCELIMIT <> null)
NOT (DEBC_CLIENTDUNNINGCODE = true and DEBC_FINANCELIMIT <> null)
Advice parameters to be filled by BID700
This program runs only ones a day (as a night job).
if it is called for the seconde time (or more) then it is a recovering. in this
case advice will be calculated only for debtors who do not have advice yet.
reset active users only if run as a night job (or recovery)
add extra range to SQL statement according to the parameters
1. Selection based on client_country:
2. Selection based on client_dunning_days (daynumber 16):

STP.TXT: N O C A L E N D E R R O W W A S F O U N D

SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT CCRY.CCRY308_ADMNO,CCRY.CCRY308_CLNTNO,CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY,CCRY.CCRY302_DAY,DEBC.DEBC_NO FROM :1/CCRY AS CCRY join :1/CLNT as CLNT on CCRY.CCRY308_ADMNO=CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and CCRY.CCRY308_CLNTNO=CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO :6 join :1/DEBC AS DEBC on DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO=CCRY.CCRY308_ADMNO and DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO=CCRY.CCRY308_CLNTNO join :1/DEBH AS DEBH on DEBC.DEBC_DEBH=DEBH.DEBH_NO join :1/DEBB AS DEBB on DEBB.DEBB_DEBC_NO=DEBC.DEBC_NO join :1/GSBU AS GSBU on GSBU.GSBU_ID = 2013 and GSBU.GSBU_OFFICE = CLNT.CLNT203_OFFICE exception join :1/CRDB AS CRDB on CRDB.CRDB_DEBC_NO=DEBC.DEBC_NO and CRDB.CRDB_CATEGORY IN(6, 7, 8, 17)
left join :1/CCRY as YY_CCRY on YY_CCRY.CCRY308_ADMNO= CCRY.CCRY308_ADMNO and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_CLNTNO=CCRY.CCRY308_CLNTNO and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY'
WHERE CCRY.CCRY302_DAY BETWEEN case when GSBU.GSBU_NUMBEROFDAYS = 10 then :2 else :3 end and case when GSBU.GSBU_NUMBEROFDAYS = 10 then :4 else :5 end and CLNT.CLNT301_DUNNING='Y' and (
((CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY and DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY<>'BE') or (CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY and DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY='BE' and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY is null ) or (CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY and DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY='BE'and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY' AND CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY<>'YY' and DEBC_LANGUAGE<>'FR') or (DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY='BE' and CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY' and DEBC_LANGUAGE='FR')) and DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY<>'' or ((CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY and DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY<>'BE') or(CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY and DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY='BE' and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY is null )or (CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY and DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY='BE' and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY' and CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY<>'YY' and DEBH_LANGUAGE<>'FR') or (DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY='BE' and CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY' and DEBH_LANGUAGE='FR')) and DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY='' and DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY<>'' or ((CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY and DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY<>'BE') or(CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY and DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY='BE' and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY is null )or (CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY and DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY='BE' and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY'and CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY<>'YY' and DEBH_LANGUAGE<>'FR' ) or (DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY='BE' and CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY' and DEBH_LANGUAGE='FR')) and DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY='' and DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY='' and DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY<>''
) and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and DEBC_LEGALCOLLECTION<>'Y' and DEBB.DEBB_NINVOICESOUTSTANDING >0 FOR FETCH ONLY

SELECT DEBC.DEBC_NO,DEBC.DEBC_DEBH,DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO,DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO,YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY FROM :1/DEBC AS DEBC join :1/DEBB AS DEBB on DEBB.DEBB_DEBC_NO=DEBC.DEBC_NO join :1/DEBH AS DEBH on DEBC.DEBC_DEBH=DEBH.DEBH_NO join :1/CLNT AS CLNT on CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO= DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO=DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO :6 join :1/GSBU AS GSBU on GSBU.GSBU_ID = 2013 and GSBU.GSBU_OFFICE = CLNT.CLNT203_OFFICE exception join :1/CRDB AS CRDB on CRDB.CRDB_DEBC_NO=DEBC.DEBC_NO and CRDB.CRDB_CATEGORY IN(6, 7, 8, 17)
left join :1/CCRY as YY_CCRY on YY_CCRY.CCRY308_ADMNO= DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_CLNTNO=DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY'
left join :1/CCRY as CCRY on ((CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY and DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY<>'BE') or (CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY and DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY='BE' and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY is null ) or (CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY and DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY='BE'and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY' AND CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY<>'YY' and DEBC_LANGUAGE<>'FR') or( DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY='BE' and CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY' and DEBC_LANGUAGE='FR')) and DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY<>'' and CCRY.CCRY308_ADMNO= DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO and CCRY.CCRY308_CLNTNO=DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO and CCRY.CCRY302_DAY=16 and CLNT.CLNT301_DUNNING='Y'
left join :1/CCRY as CCRY2 on ((CCRY2.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY and DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY<>'BE') or(CCRY2.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY and DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY='BE' and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY is null )or (CCRY2.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY and DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY='BE' and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY' and CCRY2.CCRY308_COUNTRY<>'YY' and DEBH_LANGUAGE<>'FR') or (DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY='BE' and CCRY2.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY' and DEBH_LANGUAGE='FR')) and DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY='' and DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY<>'' and CCRY2.CCRY308_ADMNO= DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO and CCRY2.CCRY308_CLNTNO=DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO and CCRY2.CCRY302_DAY=16 and CLNT.CLNT301_DUNNING='Y'
left join :1/CCRY as CCRY3 on ((CCRY3.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY and DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY<>'BE') or(CCRY3.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY and DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY='BE' and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY is null )or (CCRY3.CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY and DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY='BE' and YY_CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY'and CCRY3.CCRY308_COUNTRY<>'YY' and DEBH_LANGUAGE<>'FR' ) or (DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY='BE' and CCRY3.CCRY308_COUNTRY='YY' and DEBH_LANGUAGE='FR'))and DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY='' and DEBH.DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY='' and DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY<>'' and CCRY3.CCRY308_ADMNO=DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO and CCRY3.CCRY308_CLNTNO=DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO and CCRY3.CCRY302_DAY=16 and CLNT.CLNT301_DUNNING='Y'
left join :1/CLDD AS CLDD1 on concat(substr('0000000000',1,10-length(trim(DEBC.DEBC_DEBC))),trim(DEBC.DEBC_DEBC)) between concat(substr('0000000000',1,10-length(trim(COALESCE(CLDD1.CLDD_DEBC_FROM,'0')))),trim(COALESCE(CLDD1.CLDD_DEBC_FROM,'0'))) and concat(substr('0000000000',1,10-length(trim(COALESCE(CLDD1.CLDD_DEBC_UNTIL,'0')))),trim(COALESCE(CLDD1.CLDD_DEBC_UNTIL,'0'))) and CLDD1.CLDD_ADMNO=DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO and CLDD1.CLDD_CLNTNO=DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO and CLDD1.CLDD_DAYNO BETWEEN case when GSBU.GSBU_NUMBEROFDAYS = 10 then :2 else :3 end and case when GSBU.GSBU_NUMBEROFDAYS = 10 then :4 else :5 end and CLNT.CLNT306_CLNTDEBTNO_NUMERIC='Y'
left join :1/CLDD AS CLDD2 on cast(DEBC.DEBC_DEBC as char(9)) between CLDD2.CLDD_DEBC_FROM and CLDD2.CLDD_DEBC_UNTIL and CLDD2.CLDD_ADMNO=DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO and CLDD2.CLDD_CLNTNO=DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO and CLDD2.CLDD_DAYNO BETWEEN case when GSBU.GSBU_NUMBEROFDAYS = 10 then :2 else :3 end and case when GSBU.GSBU_NUMBEROFDAYS = 10 then :4 else :5 end and CLNT.CLNT306_CLNTDEBTNO_NUMERIC='N' left join :1/CLDD AS CLDD3 on DEBC.DEBC_DEBH between CLDD3.CLDD_DEBH_FROM and CLDD3.CLDD_DEBH_UNTIL and CLDD3.CLDD_ADMNO=DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO and CLDD3.CLDD_CLNTNO=DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO and CLDD3.CLDD_DAYNO BETWEEN case when GSBU.GSBU_NUMBEROFDAYS = 10 then :2 else :3 end and case when GSBU.GSBU_NUMBEROFDAYS = 10 then :4 else :5 end
WHERE
(CLDD1.CLDD_DAYNO <>0 or CLDD2.CLDD_DAYNO <>0 or CLDD3.CLDD_DAYNO <>0) and (CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY<>'' or CCRY2.CCRY308_COUNTRY<>'' or CCRY3.CCRY308_COUNTRY<>'') and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and DEBC_LEGALCOLLECTION<>'Y' and DEBB.DEBB_NINVOICESOUTSTANDING>0 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROW
delete from :1/CRDB where CRDB_DATEADDED=':2' and CRDB_CATEGORY in (6, 7, 8, 17)
DELETE FROM :1/CRCL WHERE CRCL_DATEADDED=':2' and CRCL_CATEGORY in (6, 7, 8, 17)
